title: PowerCenter Portal & Dashboards
description: Access a centralized portal for managing key business operations and visualizing performance through interactive dashboards.

title: Inventory Tracking
description: Monitor stock levels in real-time and receive alerts for low inventory on key items.

title: Employee Scheduling
description: Create and manage staff schedules efficiently with built-in shift swap and availability tools.

title: Sales Reporting
description: Generate detailed sales reports to analyze trends and improve profitability.

title: Menu Management
description: Easily update menu items, prices, and descriptions across locations in real-time.

title: Labor Cost Monitoring
description: Track labor costs against sales to optimize staffing levels and maintain profitability.

title: Compliance Management
description: Keep track of health inspections, certifications, and other compliance-related tasks.

title: Customer Feedback Insights
description: Gather and analyze customer feedback to enhance service quality and satisfaction.

title: Equipment Maintenance
description: Schedule and track maintenance for key equipment to minimize downtime.

title: Training Management
description: Assign and track employee training sessions to ensure staff readiness and compliance.

title: Payroll Integration
description: Integrate payroll processing with scheduling and labor cost tracking for seamless operations.
